What you get by joining

Small groups shouldn’t have to manage servers, SaaS bills, and tool sprawl. Join our network and use our maintained, privacy‑respecting stack. Each group gets their own login for the services below.

Mautic — Email & Journeys

Run newsletters and segmented campaigns with an open-source, GDPR‑friendly stack. Your group gets its own login and can manage subscribers, templates, and automations—no SaaS lock-in.

Contact

Nextcloud — Files & Collaboration

Secure cloud storage, document sharing, calendars, and team spaces. Collaborate on docs and keep track of assets in a privacy‑respecting home for your group.

Contact

Matomo — Privacy‑First Analytics

Understand your website traffic without handing data to third parties. Configured for consent‑aware, responsible insights across your pages.

Contact

Shared Hosting & Maintenance

Skip the overhead. We host, patch, and monitor the stack so small groups don’t have to. You focus on your mission—we handle the boring (and important) parts.

Contact

Onboarding & Support

We help you migrate lists, import files, and get your first campaigns and spaces set up. Friendly support when you need it.

Contact

Community Network Benefits

Be part of a federation of like‑minded groups—shared knowledge, co‑learning, and optional cross‑promotion opportunities.
